article_title: IMF Says Bank of Japan Should Stand Ready for More Easing
article_text:
TOKYO—The Bank of Japan should stand ready to implement further easing to achieve its elusive inflation goal, the International Monetary Fund said Friday, even as positive economic data and a rallying stock market have generated cautious optimism among Japanese policy makers.

In a blunt message, the IMF said that the central bank’s radical easing policy so far has failed to bring a “desired regime shift” toward 2% inflation....
